EmailTemplate.name: 20JuneWeb-WinningBid.Thank You Feb21
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending - Resources from our RFP Response Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for attending our “Building a Winning Bid: How to Respond to Requests for Proposals" webinar held on June 20. Proposal expert Tom Sant presented a step-by-step process and valuable tips to help you through each stage of responding to a request for a proposal or quote (RFP/RFQ). Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. We hope you find them informative: Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-building-winning-bid-how-respond-requests-proposals> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Building-a-Winning-Bid--MBO-Partners-Webinar.pdf> Featured Speaker Tom Sant Q&A
